text: Really insightful talk by @holly_cummins on ‘How to love k8s and Not Wreck the Planet’! Certainly gave me something to think about. Thanks for showing simple easy to implement examples on how to achieve this! #KubeCon

author.description: Developer IBM Cloud, happy and bold, and everything distributed. she/her. Ausländer in Deutschland.
author.name: Somaya Jamil
